resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207097</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Life on an Island: Early Settlers Off the Rock-Bound Coast of Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben auf einer Insel: Frühe Siedleren weg 
von Felsen-Springen Küste von Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie sur une île : Les premiers colons 
outre du Roche-Bondissent la côte du Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida em um console: Os settlers adiantados 
fora do Rocha-Limitam a costa de Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita su un'isola: I settlers in anticipo 
fuori del Roccia-Limitano il litorale della Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή σε ένα νησί: Πρώτοι άποικοι από τη 
συνδεδεμένη ακτή του Maine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida en una isla: Los colonos tempranos del 
Roca-Limitan la costa de Maine</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the difficult lives and environment of everyday people on several of the 5,000 islands off the coast of Maine. It features stories about family life and includes a business ledger, personal journal, and other documents.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die schwierigen Leben und die Umgebung
der täglichen Leute auf mehreren der 5.000 Inseln weg von der Küste 
von Maine. Es kennzeichnet Geschichten über Familienleben und 
schließt ein Geschäft Hauptbuch, ein persönliches Journal und 
andere Dokumente ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine les vies et l'environnement difficiles des
personnes journalières sur plusieurs des 5.000 îles outre de la 
côte du Maine. Il comporte des histoires au sujet de la vie de 
famille et inclut un registre d'affaires, un journal personnel, et 
d'autres documents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina as vidas e o ambiente difíceis de povos 
diários em diversos dos 5.000 consoles fora da costa de Maine. 
Caracteriza histórias sobre a vida de família e inclui um 
livro-razão do negócio, um jornal pessoal, e outros originais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina le vite e l'ambiente difficili della gente
giornaliere su varie delle 5.000 isole fuori del litorale della Maine.
Caratterizza le storia circa vita di famiglia ed include un 
registro di affari, un giornale personale ed altri documenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις δύσκολα ζωές και το περιβάλλον των 
καθημερινών ανθρώπων σε αρκετά από τα 5.000 νησιά από την 
ακτή του Maine. Χαρακτηρίζει τις ιστορίες για την 
οικογενειακή ζωή και περιλαμβάνει ένα επιχειρησιακό καθολικό, 
ένα προσωπικό περιοδικό, και άλλα έγγραφα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina las vidas y el ambiente difíciles de la 
gente diaria en varias de las 5.000 islas de la costa de Maine. 
Ofrece historias sobre vida de familia e incluye un libro mayor 
del negocio, un diario personal, y otros documentos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207097</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107267</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/life-on-an-island-early-settlers-off-the-rock-bound-coast-of-maine</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
